newsitem.title: JAPAN: RESEARCH ALERT - Teraoka Seisakusho rated.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Teraoka Seisakusho rated.

text.p: Yamaichi Research Institute of Securities and Economics Inc said it has assigned Teraoka Seisakusho Co Ltd a "2" rating.

In its three-grade rating system, the research institute assigns a "2" rating to issues whose values it sees moving within 10 percentage points in either direction of the Tokyo Stock Exchange first-section TOPIX index over the next six months.
